name: OTHER_PAYOR_INFO
description: Information of other payors who paid the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OTH_PAY_INFO_TY_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the type of information of other payors.
entries: Primary Payor Claim Check or Remittance Date

columns.name: OTH_PAY_INFO_VAL
columns.description: This is the value of the information of type mentioned in the corresponding line of Claim Information item 1120 (CLM 1120).
